name: 2D Shooter Re-Worked
description:
In this finalized version of the 2D Shooter Project, I made 3 modifications.

Modifications:

1. I drew up a new background for the game's levels and made it connect so when repeated it looks like one big image. 

2. I created a custom song to play in the background of my game. I used the application Arcade.

3. I made level three more complex in comparison to the first two levels. In this level, you need to navigate around asteroids to ambush your targets. 

Credits:

Created by: Kristina Malkowski
